extendedInfo.description: THE #1 KICKER GAME ON MOBILEBecome an NFL Kicker! Choose your favorite team and get ready for the ultimate kicking game from the makers of hit games Flick Golf, Flick Soccer and the award winning NFL Flick Quarterback.FEATURING ALL 32 OFFICIAL NFL TEAMSAwesome graphics featuring you as the kicker with incredibly detailed players in the most impressive setting ever seen in a kicker game!AUTHENTIC NIKE UNIFORMS AND EQUIPMENTAddicting gameplay that is easy to learn but hard to master. Kick field goals with ultimate accuracy and compete with facebook friends across three different game modes.Play to unlock classic and alternate team uniforms, cheerleaders and official Nike football equipment. Upgrade your stadium from a limited capacity starter stadium to a high tech temple to football!FEATURESâ All 32 official NFL teamsâ All new Nike uniforms and equipmentâ Compete with facebook friendsâ Upgrade your stadiumâ Kick field goals like a pro NFL playerâ Perform coffin corner puntsâ Customize your jersey with name and numberâ XP level up system based on kicking skillâ Live NFL news feed tickerâ Superb high resolution graphicsCONTACTHELP: www.fullfat.com/supportVISIT: www.fullfat.comSOCIALLIKE: facebook.com/fullfatgamesFOLLOW: twitter.com/fullfatgames+1: gplus.to/fullfatgamesWATCH: youtube.com/fullfatgames

reviews.title: Really Fun
reviews.comment: Really fun, easy, smooth, funny! Love the way you can name and number your kicker
reviews.author: Ramiro Ramirez

reviews.title: It\'s Good!
reviews.comment: App froze and wouldn\'t reopen after two plays. Rebooted phone and was fine. Fun game! Habit forming!
reviews.author: Nicholas Tozier

reviews.title: Galaxy s2
reviews.comment: Pretty addictive game with heavy graphics.... 5stars if there could be more levels..
reviews.author: Sai Srinivas

reviews.comment: This game is so addicting. I played it for an hour and just wanna keep playing it. I played field goal kicking mania and this game is way better
reviews.author: Zachary Almendinger

reviews.title: Very fun game
reviews.comment: Really great I love how they put in the entertainment of the player dancing out of excitement but all around great game with some good graphics.
reviews.author: Jordan Masterson

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Simple, Addictive, Looks Great, Plays Great. Just wish there was more to it with stadium upgrades etc and maybe some more game modes.
reviews.author: Aiden Dale

reviews.title: Simply an amazing game!
reviews.comment: Great game, smooth, easy to play, keep going guys you are doing a great job!
reviews.author: Daniel Cooper

reviews.comment: I like the graphics, audio and game play. Thx for an awesome free game. I would like the celebration dances to represent the game.  They are very feminine and I might take that as an insultra of I was a kicker at any level. My 10 year old saw a few of them and said, \"they look like ballerinas with no rhythm\". From the mouth of babes..........
reviews.author: Travis Oden

reviews.title: Try NFL Matchups - 7Vq4ZQor2G
reviews.comment: Use that referral above to get free starter items and try a very fun nfl game, new events all the time card packs loaded with top tier cards I have all kinds of top end cards with no money spent come try it..thx!
reviews.author: Baron B

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Awesome. Gameplay and animations are choppy and lag, also I think there should be different views,such as third person for all modes,not just corner kick. Good game,but still needs updates.
reviews.author: Aaron Pittman

reviews.title: GREAT!
reviews.comment: This game is awesome. The only thing I ask for is for more choices of Nike cleats and gloves. Also, more first person effects.
reviews.author: Blake Risner

reviews.title: Well made
reviews.comment: I live in a country where American football is irrelevant, and I have no idea how the game is played. This app is great though - anyone can pick up and play. Very smooth graphics.
reviews.author: Bryn Barker

reviews.title: Fun Game
reviews.comment: A very fun and addictive game. The only problem is that I can\'t get the sound to work. Please update to fix this glitch.
reviews.author: Mike Whiston

reviews.title: Cool Game
reviews.comment: Fun game force closed a few times in beggining but is fine now my 3 year old and I play all the time easy enough for kids to have fun and yet still challenging enough for adults, highly reccomended
reviews.author: Kevin Pearson

reviews.title: Rediculously addictive
reviews.comment: Graphics look justbk like madden...Flick kickin is awesome n the authentic teams n uniforms rock...also like how easy it is to earn points WITHOUT BUYING WITH REAL $
reviews.author: Michael Cooney

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I find no flaws with this game at all. Love it to kill time or just relax. Great app!
reviews.author: Derek Stockbridge

reviews.title: Cool Awesome
reviews.comment: Its fun to play and easy to play
reviews.author: Christian L\303\263pez

reviews.title: Needs alil fixin
reviews.comment: I would give it 5 stars. But every 2nd game I play in coffin corner it shuts down and stops working.  And it pops my speaker on my phone.  Fix this bug and ill give it 5 stars.
reviews.author: Michael Silvey

reviews.title: Love the game but not on a tablet!
reviews.comment: Awesome game works good on our phone but for some reason I can barely make it past the field goal post playing on my tablet:(
reviews.author: Amanda Wilkins

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Not bad.. love the dancing.. support realistic
reviews.author: Cee Broaden
